Familiarize yourself with work instruction and manuals (online or at the premises) before using any power tools available in the Garage Lab. If you would like to use 3D printer, you need to undergo\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=a4e29d3b-ae48-480e-bce9-87eba02602d5&source=TRAINING\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Introduction to 3D printing\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" training and if you would like to solder, request individual instruction with \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Garage Coordinator\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Do check if there any specific legal requirements you need to fulfill for repairing or controlling your specific equipment.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once you complete this training, you can request the keys to EPAM Garage IL at the Reception Desk any time during its working hours. It is recommended to reserve the Garage IL room via Outlook in advance.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please make sure you clear the desk and turn off the equipment when you are leaving. Do not touch others’ work, and don’t try to turn it on, as you have no guarantee that it is working
